snippet: Michael M. Calbert, a 14-year veteran of Kohlberg Kravis Roberts who led the team that invests in the retail industry, is retiring and has been succeeded by Nathaniel H. Taylor, a K.K.R. partner.
abstract: Michael M. Calbert, a 14-year veteran of Kohlberg Kravis Roberts who led the team that invests in the retail industry, is retiring and has been succeeded by Nathaniel H. Taylor, a K.K.R. partner.

headline.main: Head of Retail Investing Departs K.K.R.
